name: Diego
quote: Diego, the Database King, spends his time reading, and playing Futbol, and reading about Futbol.

name: Elizabeth
quote: When she's not manipulating the DOM, Elizabeth loves the nightlife. She's got to boogey, on the disco 'round.

name: Mark
quote: In his free time, Mark enjoys long walks on the beach, classical literature, and world peace. Also, sarcasm.
